messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: Os Gêmeos are two brothers.
They are twins, so they look the same.
They are from São Paulo.
They are painters.
They paint small things and very big pictures.
Their pictures have many colors.
They paint pictures of people on buildings.
Their work is often very big.
So they need big machines to help them.
In 2007, they painted all of a castle in Scotland.
